title: [Question] Good professors for Research Work
content: Primary goal is to secure a PhD abroad after my undergrad in CSE. Who are some professors in RR campus to Collab with who pump out good research papers frequently?

comments.body: Dr. Gowri could be a good person to seek out and ask for help.  Check with Prof. Sathya prasad (CIE), Prof. Aditya or Vadiraja (from the IoT Team - 11th Flr) if they can help.

You can't pick a random prof. You need to mention what your research interests are and then someone can guide you to the relevant profs. This isn't a game where you throw everything at the wall and hope something sticks.
